body.p: What is the point estimate for the proportion of all female college students who exercise on a regular basis? (Numbers are rounded to two decimal places as needed.)

response.name: stronger
response.feedback: Incorrect. You need to find what proportion of the females in the sample exercise on a regular basis. It looks like you incorrectly used the total sample size (2,540) in the denominator.

response.name: weaker
response.feedback: Correct. Of the 1,220 females in the sample, 818 exercise on a regular basis, so the sample proportion is 818 / 1,220 = 0.67.

response.name: about the same
response.feedback: Incorrect. This number represents the sample proportion of students (males and females) who exercise on a regular basis. Note that you are asked to focus only on the females.

response.name: about the same
response.feedback: Incorrect. This is the sample proportion of females in the sample. You want the sample proportion of females who regularly exercise.

part.hint: What proportion of the females in the sample exercise on a regular basis?
